alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 11:53AM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Cimarron County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to Midnight CST Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call 844-465-4997 for road information.
